titleStmt.title: A briefe discourse of royall monarchie, as of the best common weale vvherin the subiect may beholde the sacred maiestie of the princes most royall estate. VVritten by Charles Merbury Gentleman in duetifull reuerence of her Maiesties most princely Highnesse. Whereunto is added by the same gen. a collection of Italian prouerbes, in benefite of such as are studious of that language.
titleStmt.author: Merbury, Charles.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Vautrollier dwelling in the Blackefrieres, by Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: "Prouerbi vulgari", in Italian, has separate divisional title and pagination; register is continuous.

A reissue, with new preliminaries, of STC 17823. This issue has a dedication in Italian to Queen Elizabeth on *2r.
